testsuite.name: SimpleBankSystemTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
You should create a database file named card.s3db. The file name should be taken from the command line arguments. The database file shouldn't be deleted after stopping the program!
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Arguments: -fileName card.s3db
1. Create an account 2. Log into account 0. Exit > 0
Bye!
